words.def: large northern deer with enormous flattened antlers in the male
the basic unit of money in Albania
flower arrangement consisting of a circular band of foliage or flowers for ornamental purposes
a statement that deviates from or perverts the truth
Ti, a plant native to the Pacific islands and China, Cordyline fruticosa.
angular distance above the horizon (especially of a celestial object)
a soft silver-white univalent element of the alkali metal group
